name: RaceCity
description:
A rather simple racing game,  can be played in solo or in two-player split-screen mode. The game currently features 45 built-in tracks in various scenery, and a track editor to create your own races!

System requirements : don't worry about it, the game isn't very demanding

Currently only runs on Windows, but there might eventually be a release for MaxOs and Linux

The game uses LWJGL for rendering and Ode4j as its physics engine.
